LanguageData.VME_LeaderConversionOutcome.description: If it goes well, target's ideoligion certainty will be reduced or they will convert. If it goes badly, they will gain certainty in their old beliefs.
LanguageData.VME_LeaderConversionOutcome.outcomeChanc: The {0} was terrible! From the first word, it was a fruitless back-and-forth argument. It dragged on for a cringe-inducingly long time.
The {0} was ineffective. Most of the arguments were unclear, and the convertee countered those that made sense.
The {0} was effective. The speech not only delivered solid arguments and visibly swayed the convertee's thoughts, but kept the crowd entertained as well.
The {0} was masterful! Old beliefs seemed to dissolve effortlessly and inevitably, and our true knowledge was accepted.
